product_name: Hoka One One Kailua Trail-Running Shoes - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The ideal shoes for runners looking for light weight, responsiveness and performance cushioning, the women's Hoka One One Kailua Trail-Running Shoes offer good traction on mountain trails. EVA midsoles feature foam that is 30% softer than traditional running shoe foam, and 2.5 times more voluminous; this extra cushioning dissipates shock from heel striking. Meta-Rocker midsole geometery is engineered with a low heel-to-toe differential that encourages efficient running mechanics; 5mm heel-to-toe drop. Lightweight breathable mesh uppers allow good airflow to keep your feet cool. Active Foot Frame midsole geometry allows the feet to sink into the shoes as opposed to sitting on top to provide great feedback to the feet while you're running. Hoka One One Kailua Trail-Running Shoes have high-abrasion rubber and a multidirectional traction design to provide sure footing on trails. Closeout.
short_description: The ideal shoes for runners looking for light weight, responsiveness and performance cushioning, the women's Hoka One One Kailua Trail-Running Shoes offer good traction on mountain trails.
